|blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} '''Leola''' formerly part of the [[Leacock-Leola-Bareville, Pennsylvania|Leacock-Leola-Bareville]] CDP before consolidating into the current [[census-designated place]] for the 2010 census,<ref>http://www.census.gov/2010census/</ref> is a community in [[Upper Leacock Township, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania|Upper Leacock]] and [[West Earl Township, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania|West Earl Township]]s in [[Lancaster County, Pennsylvania|Lancaster County]] in the state of [[Pennsylvania]]. It is located along Pennsylvania Route [[Pennsylvania Route 23|23]] between the city of [[Lancaster, Pennsylvania|Lancaster]] and the borough of [[New Holland, Pennsylvania|New Holland]]. As of the [[2010 United States census|2010 census]]<ref>http://www.census.gov/#</ref> the population was 7,214 residents. ==References== <references /> {{coord|40|05|30|N|76|11|05|W|type:city_region:US-PA_source:GNIS-enwiki|display=title}} {{Lancaster County, Pennsylvania}} [[Category:Census-designated places in Lancaster County, Pennsylvania]]
